item.description:
After the hustle & bustle of the holidays join us at our Monthly Meet Up and make new friends or just catch up with old ones!

Jakes Dixie Roadhouse
220 Moody Street, Waltham, MA
(781) 894-4227

http://www.jakes-bbq....

Hi Everybody!

Jakes Dixie Roadhouse is a great location for our group. We usually have the either whole room to the left to ourselves or tables in the back depending on the size of the group and the owner does a great job of making us feel welcome. With the casual atmosphere it is the perfect location to socialize. The food and drinks are affordable and there's plenty of room for us. We would like to alternate nights of the week (to accommodate those with custody days). Looking forward to seeing you there!

If you RSVP yes and your plans change be sure to update your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the tables with the meetup signs.

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group January Meetup
